title: Heavenly appeals.
abstract: After many millennia of being tortured in hell, Raymond K. Hessle has fnally earned a chance to appeal his sentence of eternal damnation. When he arrives at the "appeals" gate of heaven, he is greeted by the angel who will preside over his case. As Raymond waits at the edge of paradise, he will finally have a chance to prove just how worthy he is.
departments: Ringling College of Art and Design
